lyrics:
[intro] (D)
I will always re-(D)member, the day you kissed my lips
Light as a (Bm)feather, and it went just like this
No, it's never been (G)better, than the summer (A) of 2002 (D)
 
We were only e-(D)leven, but acting like grownups
Like we are in the (Bm)present, drinking from plastic cups
Singing love is for-(G)ever and ever, (A) well I guess that was (D)true
 
[pre-chorus]
D(Bm)ancing on the hood in the (G)middle of the woods
On an (D)old Mustang, (A)where we sang
(Bm)Songs with all our (G)childhood friends
(A) And it (A-stop)went like this, say
 
[chorus]
(G)Oops I (D)got 99 (A)problems singing bye, bye, (Bm)bye
Hold up, (G)if you wanna go and take a (D)ride with me
Better (A)hit me baby one more (Bm)time
(G)Paint a picture for (D)you and me
On the (A)days when we were (Bm)young
(G)Singing at the top of both our (A)lungs
 
Now we're under the (D)covers, fast forward to eighteen
We are more than (Bm)lovers, yeah we are all we need
When we're holding each (G)other
I'm taken back (A) to 2002 (D)
 
[pre-chorus]
D(Bm)ancing on the hood in the (G)middle of the woods
On an (D)old Mustang, (A)where we sang
(Bm)Songs with all our (G)childhood friends
(A) And it went like this, say
 
[chorus]
(G)Oops I (D)got 99 (A)problems singing bye, bye, (Bm)bye
Hold up, (G)if you wanna go and take a (D)ride with me
Better (A)hit me baby one more (Bm)time
(G)Paint a picture for (D)you and me
On the (A)days when we were (Bm)young
(G)Singing at the top of both our (A)lungs
On the day we fell in (D)love (A) (Bm)
On the (G)day we fell in (D)love (A) (Bm) (G)
 
[single strum]
D(Bm)ancing on the hood in the (G)middle of the woods
On an (D)old Mustang, (A)where we sang
(Bm)Songs with all our (G)childhood friends (A) oh no
[double strum]
(G)Oops I (D)got 99 (A)problems singing bye, bye, (Bm)bye
Hold up, (G)if you wanna go and take a (D)ride with me
Better (A)hit me baby one more (Bm)time
[normal strum]
(G)Paint a picture for (D)you and me
On the (A)days when we were (Bm)young
(G)Singing at the top of both our (A)lungs
On the day we fell in (D)love (A) (Bm)
On the (G)day we fell in (D)love (A) (Bm)
On the (G)day we fell in (D)love (A) (Bm)
On the (G)day we fell in (D)love (A) (Bm)
[slow down]
On the (G)day we fell in (D)love [end]
